et3.java.model

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • et3.java.model.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Library is a class that represents a real library that contains documents and subscribed users.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Library(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs an empty Library with the specified name.
